title: An answer to the maidens frollick: or, The taylors resolution to be reveng'd of these petticoat press-masters, by bob-tailing their gowns and petticoats for the future, more than ever they have done heretofore. To the tune of, An orange. Licensed according to order.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Black [i.e. Back,
